title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 526.2 - Person
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 526.2 - Person

State Regulations

The term person includes an individual, partnership
(including a general, limited or special partnership or joint venture), society, association, joint-stock company, corporation, estate, receiver, trustee, assignee, referee or any other person acting as an agent or in a
fiduciary or representative capacity, whether appointed by a court or
otherwise, and any combination of the foregoing, and any State, municipality or
instrumentality thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
526.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
